Article.title: Article
Article.description: Represents a news article or a blog post.

content.description: The main content of the article in Markdown format.

imageUrl.description: URL of the main image for the article.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the article was created.

tags.description: Tags to control article placement on the homepage.

Player.title: Player
Player.description: Represents a player in the team.

name.description: The full name of the player.

imageUrl.description: URL of the player's portrait photo.

Match.title: Match
Match.description: Represents a soccer match, either upcoming or completed.

date.description: The date and time of the match.

competition.description: The competition or league the match is part of.

homeTeam.description: The name of the home team.

awayTeam.description: The name of the away team.

homeTeamLogoUrl.description: URL of the home team's logo.

awayTeamLogoUrl.description: URL of the away team's logo.

homeScore.description: The final score of the home team.

awayScore.description: The final score of the away team.

location.description: The location or stadium where the match will be played.

Photo.title: Photo
Photo.description: Represents a photo in the gallery.

title.description: The title or description of the photo.

createdAt.description: The timestamp when the photo was added.

Partner.title: Partner
Partner.description: Represents a club sponsor or partner.

name.description: The name of the partner company.

ClubInfo.title: ClubInfo
ClubInfo.description: Stores general information about the club.

logoUrl.description: URL of the club's main logo.

historyImageUrl.description: URL of an image for the history section.

presidentWord.description: A message from the club president.

presidentWordImageUrl.description: URL of an image for the president's word section.

presidentWishes.description: The president's wishes for the club.

welcomeTitle.description: The main title for the welcome message on the homepage.

welcomeSubtitle.description: The subtitle for the welcome message on the homepage.

welcomeImageUrl.description: URL of the main image for the homepage when no articles are present.

welcomeImageUrl2.description: URL of the second image for the homepage welcome slider.

welcomeImageUrl3.description: URL of the third image for the homepage welcome slider.

contactEmail.description: The official contact email for the club.

contactPhone.description: The official contact phone number for the club.

address.description: The physical address of the club.

googleMapsUrl.description: The embed URL for Google Maps.

facebookUrl.description: URL of the club's Facebook page.

twitterUrl.description: URL of the club's Twitter profile.

instagramUrl.description: URL of the club's Instagram profile.

youtubeUrl.description: URL of the club's YouTube channel.

/articles/{articleId}.description: Stores individual news articles for the club.

/players/{playerId}.description: Stores individual player profiles for the team.

/matches/{matchId}.description: Stores upcoming and past match information.

/photos/{photoId}.description: Stores photos for the media gallery.

/partners/{partnerId}.description: Stores information about club partners and sponsors.

/clubInfo/{infoId}.description: Stores general club information like history. Typically a single document.
